entity.Name: Account

Description.description: Business that represents a customer or potential customer. The company that is billed in business transactions.
Type an ID number or code for the account to quickly search and identify the account in system views.
Type the city for the primary address.
Type the first line of the primary address.
Type the second line of the primary address.
Type the third line of the primary address.
Type the ZIP Code or postal code for the primary address.
Type the main phone number associated with the primary address.
Type of the account.
Select the category that best describes the relationship between the account and your organization.
Type the primary email address for the account.
Informar o CNPJ da Conta.
Coluna de integração Backbone.
Informe o código MEC da empresa.
Visualiza a coluna nome da portaria.
Usuário responsável pela criação do registro no backbone.
Shows who last updated the record.
